data: “And I maintain,” said Reggie, flourishing the Britannia-metal teapot (in order, it is supposed, to lend a spurious emphasis to the banalité of his sentiment), “that it’s better to have played and lost than never—”
The Babe, B.A. : being the uneventful history of a young gentleman at Cambridge University
